description:
I tried asunder and juicer on a new CD. Neither could populate the CDs content. This not only populated the tracks but had a simple option to upload to Gnudb. 

Worked great on a steam deck with an external drive.

Impressed, fre:ac works very well (I'm using KDE Neon). I had previosly tried asunder which failed to access the CDDB database leaving each track untitled and soundjuicer which could not access the external USB cdrom. I loaded fre:ac and everything worked!
A lot of music formats and customisation. The Best Converter.

Best app I've used.
I use this in both Linux and Windows.
It's easy to use.
I don't think it is missing any functions.
It is actively being developed-updated.
Don't be afraid of beta versions they typically work, if not, support is awesome, Robert Kausch (Developer) loves to hear from users.
Please add a system mode or Dark Mode to the settings tab. This is the only app that I use that stays white only background.

The flathub doesn't has the latest version. For ex. the version of FDK-AAC Encoder is 4.0.0 in flathub whereas the author's site has v4.0.1. The new version has AAC High Efficiency, HEv2 and Enhanced Low Delay codec, which are better than AAC-LC.
summary: Great app but not up to date on flathub

description: UI could use some love and i wish it used wayland other than that very good.
A bit odd in the UI, but does the job and does the job extremely well! You can even embed downloaded Cover art in the FLAC tags. It's my replacement for Audex.

Even if the GUI is not the most modern approach or a native Gnome/KDE GUI the ripper itself is one of the best out there. There is a lot of options like a "paranoia mode" and many features for automation.
summary: One of the best and most reliable rippers out there

description: Alle Formate und mehr möglich, sauberer Umgang mit tags, wenn man sich kurz in die Tabs-Struktur eingearbeitet hat gut zu bedienen.
Funciona perfecto para rippear CDs en MP3, aunque trae opciones mas opciones como FLAC
Lo máximo en conversión de audio.
summary: La Aplicación definitiva para convertir audio
